name: Knights Legion: Endless Run
description:
This is a Casual, Auto-Runner, Platforms game with a little of Action too!!!.

This is a Indie Solo Developer Game. This game offers the possibility of play even if you only have 3 free minutes. You will find Monsters, Spells, Knights, Platforms, Traps and more. Very Easy to Learn and Very Hard to Master.

To report any Bugs, you can do it in our  Support Link.
There is also a button in the game with this link.

FEATURES:
★ Cloud Save Game.
★ Many F2P Choices.
★ Choose your own special Runner and move always to the future.
★ Beat monsters  with your Sword to clear the way.
★ 3 Special Skills to help you get further than anyone else.
★ More than 30 Unique Monsters.
★ Beautiful Graphics.
★ High Score System to showoff with your friends.
★ Many Achievements, even hidden Special Ones.
★ Death is Not the End, you can "always" get an extra Life.
